name: The Mammoth: A Cave Painting
description: Tell the 5 million year story of the mammoth in 5 minutes.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX10 compatible video card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
